item.title: League of Legends: Wild Rift (@wildrift) on X 🌄
item.description: After a thorough investigation, we can confirm: this hammer defies all logic. Stronger than steel and inexplicably equipped with–what exactly are those?? No one knows. One thing’s certain—this isn’t just a tool. Was it forged by genius or madness? The world may never know.

item.title: League of Legends: Wild Rift (@wildrift) on X 🌄
item.description: Tune into our patch 6.1 preview on April 3rd UTC and be teleported to whole new heights along with a very special guest 🏆

item.title: League of Legends: Wild Rift (@wildrift) on X 🌄
item.description: THE HAMMER MIGHT BE THE MISSION. BUT THE JOURNEY IS WHAT MATTERS! #LETSYORDLE
